nodes.text: Tidros was the capital city of the planet Champala, homeworld of the sentient Chagrian species. Like all Chagrian settlements, it was built within a tidal zone of one of the planet's oceans, meaning it was regularly entirely submerged by rising tides. The only part of the city designed to remain above water at all times was its spaceport.

Tidros was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Lead by Example, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The city originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the Legacy Era Campaign Guide, a 2009 roleplaying supplement for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
